name: Admissions Processing
description: Ensures that every application is evaluated fairly and promptly by applying merit-based criteria. This service is designed to deliver timely decisions that empower applicants to plan their academic futures with certainty, supported by measurable response times and rigorous compliance checks.

features.name: Efficient Decision Timelines
features.description: Ensures rapid application review through structured workflows and continuous monitoring, so decisions are delivered within clear timeframes.

features.name: Merit-Based Evaluation System
features.description: Processes applications using transparent, merit-based criteria with measurable performance metrics that underpin fairness and objectivity.

jobs_to_be_done.name: Prompt Evaluation
jobs_to_be_done.explanation: I want to be sure my application is reviewed objectively and promptly.

role.name: Domestic
role.description: Local learners eligible for domestic funding and support services.
